name: Fortune Vision
text: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Fortune Lady" card from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn, if a card(s) you control is banished by card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can activate this effect; this turn, monsters you control cannot be destroyed by card effects (even if this card leaves the field). Once per turn, if a card(s) your opponent controls is banished by card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can make the next battle damage you take this turn become 0 (even if this card leaves the field). You can only activate 1 "Fortune Vision" per turn.
